# Review of HITWAY Electric Bike E Bike Foldable City Bikes 36V8.4Ah/36V12Ah Battery, 250W Motor, Assist Range Up to 35-70KM BK5

## Introduction
- Briefly introduce the HITWAY Electric Bike and provide an overview of its key features such as the foldable design, battery capacity, motor power, and assist range.

## Design and Build Quality
- Discuss the overall design of the electric bike, including its foldable feature and build quality. 
- Mention any standout design elements or features that enhance the user experience.

## Performance
- Evaluate the performance of the 250W motor and how it handles different terrains.
- Discuss the battery life and how long it lasts on a single charge.
- Mention the assist range of up to 35-70KM and whether it holds up in real-world usage.

## Comfort and Convenience
- Talk about the comfort level of the bike, including the seat, handlebars, and overall riding experience.
- Discuss any convenient features such as the LCD display, pedal assist modes, or storage options.

## Pros and Cons

- Provide a balanced perspective on the strengths and weaknesses of the product.

## Conclusion

- Recommend whether or not this electric bike is worth considering for potential buyers.
